title: Clinical Producer
summary: As part of the Clinical Products team, Apple is looking for an individual to guide overall development of health products in collaboration with cross-functional teams.
description: You will identify clinical opportunities and innovative solutions in the health and wellness space. Other responsibilities include...
key_qualifications: 8+ years of experience in the health care space, preferably regulated medical products and/or digital health products
education_experience: - Bachelor’s degree, preferably in engineering, science, business or equivalent field
additional_requirements: - This is a site based role.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $165,500 and $248,700, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder through participation in Apple’s discretionary employee stock programs...
